body: @RonaldGrand6969 Not exactly how you described, but you can try https://nhentai.net/g/77239/. A guy try to ntr his friend but ended up getting ntr instead. He lost his sex friend with that said guy.
Chapter 1 is basically the Setup for the whole NTR shebang; Chapter 2 is the MC arc, finally being an Alpha and exact the revenge. But this... holy shit, we gone even more complicated.
This is itaiamai in the future
The issue would be resolved if he just shot and killed that actor.

@RonaldGrand6969 "Technically" this manga from Charu fits your description, [  https://nhentai.net/g/400802/  ]  in here the ntr guy steals the girl away from the main protagonist she had a crush on, then he leaves her when the ntr guy himself gets ntr'd by other men too. Day 9 of asking if anyone knows of any NTR where the guy steals the girl then the guy dumps her.
